data.eml:eml: The identity of shield bugs described by Francis Walker from Taiwan (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tsai, Jing-Fu, Rédei, Dávid (2009): The identity of shield bugs described by Francis Walker from Taiwan (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae). Zootaxa 2152: 43-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.188737
